attributes.additional_details:
I believe that no any household in in London hasn't  been hit hard or affected financially by the pandemic.
As a consequence, I believe that the vast majority of people I met are finding it extremely unviable to replace their existing vehicles that do not meet, or comply the new legislation. 
I hope that the government will pay a considerable attention to this issue as it will come with a big relief for all those who are already having enough to bear on their shoulders.
attributes.background: I would like the parliament to urge the government to postpone the expansion of the existing ultra low emission zone which is due on October.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the London Assembly and the London Mayor.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
